menu.label: Suggest meals
menu.prompt: Provide a list of the names of five meals that are healthy and tasty.

menu.label: Recipe
menu.prompt: Please provide the recipe for the meal. Include the ingredients and the preparation steps.

menu.label: Allergy information
menu.prompt: Please provide me with the allergy information.

menu.label: Nutritional values
menu.prompt: Please provide me a raw estimate of the nutritional values
